haleine qui alterne route, terre et circuit. Au royaume de l'intox et de la 
mauvaise foi, les pilotes sont rois..."﻿

captions.text: To compete for victory on the Dark Dog Tour
many wager on true jet fighters:
wicked superbikes, sharp roadsters
lightweight supermotos
even old bikes prepared as hell
In short, for many riders the DDT is an arm race
Others, on the contrary
are more responsible and pick a GT trail
Aware that a huge butt pain
could put an end to their ambitions
So what are the Multistrada advantages ?
Well its assets are that it does everything near perfect
and even if not perfect at anything, good in all aspect
And you have the less sore bottom in the evening ?
Yes I could get back immediately
Some other play the physical economy:
No clutch lever, no gear shift…may god forgive them
they took a scooter !
When doing the Moto Tour with a scooter
is it because of laziness to pop the clutches ?
No you see it is comfortable in fact
Yeah ? not back pain though ?
A bit yes though the seat is more comfy than on a bike
Finally there's the cowards.They're so afraid to be alone
that they came with a (girl)friend
Anyway a puppet they threw in the basket next to them
But among these various machines one question stays:
which one is the best to win the Dark Dog Tour ?
To find the answer, we started with David Bournisien
The guy designing the world largest road rally
There’s no best bike to win the Moto Tour
It has actually had been thought
and that’s why there’s road specials
track specials and off-road specials
A bike gaining some time on track
will lose some other off-road
And the same goes for engine displacements
And is there some years where you’re like:
This year is more for superbikes or supermoto
It happens but I make it so it doesn’t happen
I try to find the right balance
Organisation wise the door is open to anyone
But soon we find out that before achieving good time
The Moto Tour requires a good preparation
The ideal bike to win the Moto Tour ?
I guess one that reaches the end first
What is there not to break ?
Well the best is to take the winning bike
Kidding ! a bike to reach the end is one
that is properly prepared
Check the security organs first
Secuty first then the engine has to be in good shape
Common things just like every day riders
A rider going for a trip checks that his vehicle
in in conditions to make a ride
Not to go with something flawed
If we feel like something’s going on
We need to change it
And what is to be enhanced before a Moto Tour ?
First I think that put some protections on
like engine covers for instance
It might look bad but so much efficient when you fall
That’s super important
The secret of good performance seems to be preparation
There ! to one of the two most armed DDT team
We're after the best machine to win the Moto Tour
Is it this one ?
Afirmative this is the one, the DST
Division Support Trailer
I think it is the best engine ever
A Lamborghini 3 cylinders
Does it rev up ?
Sure ! about 1 200rpm at full charge full throttle
And about the bikes what have you done ?
What was strictly necessary actually
We did what was mandatory
Some oil and other fluids pans
Two additional lights
No secret weapon here
And to find those we need to spy on the top pilots
First, there is the basics that Bruno Schiltz
4th of the last DDT explains to us
What’s the margin between someone who recon before
and someone who did not ?
Is it about the same ?
In seconds how much the difference ?
Personally I don’t like not to recon first
just come and play isn’t my thing
Some are more skilled at this game than others
But as for me it is important
between no recon and with recon It’s 10 seconds
Yeah
And there’s the tips not to give up stupidly
Especially after a little crash
Is it itchy ?
Fuck yeah man it stamped my ass
you can’t even imagine
First to win the Moto Tour
the most important is a bike that ignites
We never know
So just in case it wouldn’t do so
I have some cables there to plug in directly
To ignite and another to recharge too
Also in case of a crash you see
the lever is floppy so it can move a bit
Just like this which is not on road bikes
these folding levers are important
since anyone can fall
Okay on your bike there’s a lot of things not to break it
but not so much to go faster in the end
What ?! you have an idea ? a solution ?
The question is: What to do in order to win
not how to not break the bike ?
In fact my bike is really simple
my fork is fully stock
and it is good because it can get anywhere this way
where you put a fork very specific you will be fast here
but not there and on road it had to get everywhere
However I have an Öhlins shock
for me it’s what’s best it’s simple and always works
This is my favorite handlebar
It's from cross when you were kid ?
Yeah that’s it !
And did you change the gearbox sprocket ?
Ah yes ! Yes I did that true
I put a really small one
Conclusion : If you’re hoping to win the Moto Tour
better work on many points
Think to every detail
From bike to assistance
through equipment, weariness management
not to be late
and of course, throttle as hell in specials
Yamaha R6, KTM Superduke, Yamaha 450 YZF
Triumph Street Triple, KTM Duke
here is the first five bikes from the last Dark Dog Tour
Hard to do better in terms of diversity
Which does not help at all concerning the
quest for the best machine
Even though some clues…
What is your ranking ?
I’ve been 3rd scratch at mercurol and 1st for the rally
Too bad I had to pedal in climbings but it’s ok
The best bike would be…
The R6 but probably with the MT09 engine inside
The best vehicle to win could it be the faith ?
To race like this between trees ?
I guess it can help for confidence but
still you have to use your brain
do both in fact
And the best bike to win ?
For me it was the Street Triple R
unfortunately I ended up in a ditch with it
But I think it is a marvelous bike for the Moto Tour
If you’d have to pick something else than a scooter ?
Something else ?
I’d like to try another of the Hondas with auto gearbox
the Crosstourer
I think the 1200cc V4 is good the chassis is good
I can’t say it would win but I guess it could be
in the front for sure
Isn’t it hard to win the Moto Tour with no front wheel ?
well it’s really hard yes but we already won this way
But it’s less expensive !
Yes much less expensive
It's the best bike to win the Moto Tour in your opinion ?
No I didn’t chose it for win but for comfort
If you want to have fun it’s a great choice
To win better look at the one at the top
I wouldn’t say the R6 is THE bike to win the Moto Tour
But Denis Bouan prove me wrong
but I have the feeling that he'd do the same on a solex
Even with a stroll around the paddock
Uneasy to find the ideal bike
But our search has not been vain
In the end the ultimate weapon seems acquired
Julien I found it and next year I'll crush you all for sure
Really? what did you find ?
I’ll pick a Denis Bouan !

title: Quelle moto pour gagner (ou pas) le Moto Tour ? (English Subtitles)
